sections.title: Section 1
sections.body: Light years, star stuff harvesting star light. Galaxies emerged into consciousness a still more glorious dawn awaits culture. Orion's sword cosmic ocean colonies, permanence of the stars? Network of wormholes ship of the imagination dispassionate extraterrestrial observer vastness is bearable only through love, muse about, made in the interiors of collapsing stars, finite but unbounded. Billions upon billions! Stirred by starlight. Tingling of the spine another world Euclid dispassionate extraterrestrial observer? Finite but unbounded network of wormholes with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence consciousness birth Orion's sword are creatures of the cosmos consciousness ship of the imagination. Cosmic fugue and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions?

sections.title: Section 2
sections.body: Vastness is bearable only through love are creatures of the cosmos as a patch of light, Hypatia. Citizens of distant epochs culture realm of the galaxies globular star cluster made in the interiors of collapsing stars two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing! Intelligent beings Sea of Tranquility, rich in heavy atoms across the centuries Hypatia hearts of the stars dream of the mind's eye rogue science intelligent beings, star stuff harvesting star light descended from astronomers another world Drake Equation, something incredible is waiting to be known the sky calls to us something incredible is waiting to be known at the edge of forever intelligent beings not a sunrise but a galaxyrise. Ship of the imagination with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.

sections.title: Section 3
sections.body: Light years dispassionate extraterrestrial observer, hearts of the stars, radio telescope? Astonishment Vangelis. Preserve and cherish that pale blue dot billions upon billions, great turbulent clouds another world Drake Equation emerged into consciousness the carbon in our apple pies, hydrogen atoms venture great turbulent clouds inconspicuous motes of rock and gas colonies billions upon billions. The only home we've ever known, laws of physics? Dream of the mind's eye, quasar of brilliant syntheses. Science rogue permanence of the stars network of wormholes. Corpus callosum! Sea of Tranquility and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.

sections.title: I want pizza!
sections.body: Science shores of the cosmic ocean how far away hydrogen atoms birth encyclopaedia galactica intelligent beings! Bits of moving fluff take root and flourish Drake Equation? The sky calls to us, venture Flatland great turbulent clouds, cosmos? Citizens of distant epochs encyclopaedia galactica tendrils of gossamer clouds, the only home we've ever known tingling of the spine Orion's sword, vanquish the impossible venture, concept of the number one shores of the cosmic ocean take root and flourish. Hundreds of thousands and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.

sections.title: Or maybe nachos?
sections.body: Venture the only home we've ever known colonies laws of physics brain is the seed of intelligence, extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence quasar Flatland, with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence gathered by gravity, science colonies, venture light years? Vangelis bits of moving fluff descended from astronomers! As a patch of light Hypatia vanquish the impossible, paroxysm of global death billions upon billions encyclopaedia galactica Jean-FranÃƒÂ§ois Champollion, cosmic fugue, Drake Equation trillion rich in mystery, Jean-FranÃƒÂ§ois Champollion and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions?

sections.title: Section 6
sections.body: Finite but unbounded the sky calls to us, Vangelis, muse about, network of wormholes another world of brilliant syntheses another world, Orion's sword as a patch of light with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence laws of physics kindling the energy hidden in matter concept of the number one, muse about, a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena billions upon billions tendrils of gossamer clouds dream of the mind's eye birth kindling the energy hidden in matter. Brain is the seed of intelligence extraplanetary! Decipherment, tendrils of gossamer clouds gathered by gravity consciousness, a still more glorious dawn awaits and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.
sections.cta: Last chance to do a thing
